app_descript:
Skype Lite

Brief: Skype Lite, specially tailored for the India market, is a streamlined version of the popular Skype app that combines communication and productivity. It provides free messaging, audio and video calls, and integrates features including SMS handling, data usage tracking, and Skype Bots. Its lightweight design ensures compatibility with a wide range of Android devices and optimal performance even on limited network connections, saving data and money for users.
